chapters.title: Chapter 24:  New Friends and Old Enemies
chapters.info: Else Grinwell, p. 359 (316)—Novice in the White Tower. Elayne describes her as a “lazy chit.” She was one of the people who allowed Rand and Mat to stay in her house (actually her parents' house) while they were traveling from Emond's Field to Caemlyn on the way to Fal Dara. She is later dismissed from the Tower because of her habit of staring at the Warders' students and not learning or doing her own work.
